summary: Completed frontend testing of Recent Activity feature in Parent Dashboard's child insights modal. All features working correctly: 7 items in quick view, View All button, Full Transactions modal with pagination (15 per page), and date filters (All Time, Today, This Week, This Month).

design_issues.screen: Child Insights Modal & Full Transactions Modal
issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement needed

passed_tests: ✅ Child insights modal opens when clicking 'View Insights' eye icon (data-testid='view-child-insights-{child_user_id}')
✅ Recent Activity section shows exactly 7 items in the child insights modal
✅ Each transaction shows description, date, and amount
✅ 'View All' button is visible and clickable (data-testid='view-all-transactions-btn')
✅ Clicking 'View All' opens the Full Transactions modal
✅ Date filter buttons are present (All Time, Today, This Week, This Month)
✅ Clicking a date filter updates the displayed transactions
✅ Pagination controls appear when more than 15 transactions exist
✅ Page navigation (Previous/Next) works correctly - tested Page 1 to Page 2
✅ Transactions are sorted newest first (descending order by date) - backend sorts by created_at DESC
✅ Full Transactions modal shows 'Showing X of Y transactions' count
✅ Transaction items have proper data-testid attributes (transaction-item-{index})
✅ Filter buttons have proper data-testid attributes (filter-all, filter-today, filter-week, filter-month)
✅ Pagination buttons have proper data-testid attributes (pagination-prev, pagination-next)
action_items: MINOR: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent components for accessibility compliance
critical_code_review_comments: Recent Activity quick view correctly limits to 7 items using .slice(0, 7)
Full Transactions modal correctly implements pagination with TRANSACTIONS_PER_PAGE = 15
Date filtering logic correctly handles 'all', 'today', 'week', 'month' filters
Backend endpoint /api/parent/children/{child_id}/insights returns up to 100 transactions sorted by created_at DESC
State management for showAllTransactions, transactionsPage, transactionsDateFilter is properly implemented
seed_data_creation: Linked child 'Aashi M' (user_cd3928036bf4) to parent 'Alka M' (user_22d32d6b6d43) for testing. Child has 17 transactions.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Recent Activity feature fully tested and working: 1) Quick view shows 7 items with description, date, amount. 2) View All opens Full Transactions modal. 3) Date filters (All Time, Today, This Week, This Month) work correctly. 4) Pagination shows 15 items per page with Previous/Next navigation. 5) Backend returns up to 100 transactions sorted by created_at DESC. 6) Test parent has 3 linked children: Aashi M (17 tx), Aashi T, Grade 3 Test Student.

quick_view_7_items.details: Recent Activity section in child insights modal shows exactly 7 items using .slice(0, 7)

view_all_button.details: View All button (data-testid='view-all-transactions-btn') opens Full Transactions modal

full_transactions_modal.details: Modal shows all transactions with pagination (15 per page)

date_filters.details: All Time, Today, This Week, This Month filters work correctly

pagination.details: Previous/Next buttons work, shows 'Page X of Y' indicator

transaction_sorting.details: Backend sorts by created_at DESC (newest first)
